title: Timeline of The Best Science Fiction Films of All Time!
author: Think Story
comment:
👽👽What are your favorite sci-fi films?👽👽 And which one do you think best predicted/predicts the future?
Check out my Sci-Fi & Fantasy Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLY9KJ1cFVs7iajBX4Ibg6jaCAH1eIuSgd
Edge of Tomorrow plot was just the strategy we all used on Nintendo games back in the 90’s.
Starship Troopers is the sh*t. It was the first "realistic" depiction of war I saw.
Personally I like all the alien movies. They’re all unique and different.
My absolute favorite from the list is Demolition Man. Fucking hilarious, made my childhood
description:
The chronological timeline of sci-fi films over the decades up till now. Do the futures they depict come close to reality?
